DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Effect Post-prandial Glycemia Safety , Tolerability Viaject 7 vs. Lispro Insulin SC Insulin Pump Therapy .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effect Post-prandial Glycemia Safety , Tolerability Viaject 7 vs. Lispro Insulin During Subcutaneous Insulin Pump Therapy
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female diagnose type 1 diabetes mellitus least 6 month 2 . Current usage subcutaneous insulin pump treatment one follow pump : Medtronic Paradigm速 Animas速 OmniPod速 ACCUCHEK Spirit速 3 . Age 1875 year 4 . HbA1c 6.0 9.0 % screen visit . 5 . Willingness attend 9 clinic visit . 1 . Pregnancy Lactation 2 . Renal insufficiency ( serum creatinine 2.0 mg/dL great ) . 3 . Anemia 4 . Congestive heart failure . 5 . Visual impairment prevent read glucose meter value ability use insulin pump continuous glucose monitoring device . 6 . Active coronary artery disease heart procedure within past 4 month . 7 . Active foot ulceration . 8 . Severe peripheral arterial disease . 9 . Stroke within past 6 month . 10 . Active alcohol abuse , substance abuse , severe mental illness . 11 . Active cancer , except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer . 12 . Major surgical operation within 30 day prior screen . 13 . Seizure disorder ( epilepsy ) . 14 . Any concurrent illness , diabetes , control stable therapeutic regimen . 15 . Currently use corticosteroid . 16 . History major noncompliance . 17 . Use investigational drug within 30 day prior screen . 18 . Bleeding disorder , treatment warfarin , low platelet count . 19 . Any insulin allergy 20 . Current complaint major infusion site problem commercially available insulin preparation , frequent occurrence infection , mark swell mark erythema . 21 . History gastroparesis .
